name: libmspack is no longer at SourceForge
short_description:
This project has left SourceForge, because SourceForce has lost its ethical compass, and is bundling crapware / malware / adware with the software it hosts or mirrors, without the consent of the software's authors.

http://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2015/06/sourceforge-locked-in-projects-of-fleeing-users-cashed-in-on-malvertising/

http://libregraphicsworld.org/blog/entry/anatomy-of-sourceforge-gimp-controversy

https://blog.l0cal.com/2015/06/02/what-happened-to-sourceforge/

Please visit the project's website,  http://www.cabextract.org.uk/libmspack/ for more information.
